Ógè Ngwunari bụ ihe omume relay eji kwalite mkparịta ụka banyéré mgbanwe ihu igwe. Ọ bụ ihe kachasị ogologo na-enweghị nkwụsịtụ nke ndị na-agba ọsọ, ndị na-anya ịnyịnya ígwè na ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji gafee mkpara aka na aka site na COP26 na Glasgow ruo COP27 na Sharm El Sheikh. Ogwe ahụ na-agagharị na mba iri na asatọ: UK, France, Belgium, Netherlands, Germany, Austria, Italy, Slovenia, Croatia, Bosnia na Herzegovina, Montenegro, Albania, Greece, Cyprus, Israel na Egypt. Njem nke puku asaa na narị asaa na iri isii kilota (4,826 mi) were ụbọchị iri anọ.
